#summary DTGen Pre-Release0.12 Compatibility.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

 * DTGen Pre-Release 0.12 requires an Oracle database.
 * An Oracle database requires an operating system.
 * The DTGen Graphical User Interface (GUI) requires^1^
   # Oracle's Application Express (APEX) installed in an Oracle database
   # a web browser.

Note ^1^: DTGen can be run entirely in command line mode, without any GUI, APEX, or Web Browser.

= Minimum Requirements =

|| *Operating System* || *Examples* ||
|| Any^2^ || Windows, Linux, OS X ||

|| *Database<br>Version* || *Database<br>Edition* || *APEX<br>Version* ||
|| Oracle11g || Any^3^ || 4.0 ||

|| *Web Browser* || *Version^4^* ||
|| Microsoft Internet Explorer || 7.0 ||
|| Mozilla Firefox || 3.5 ||
|| Google Chrome || 4.0 ||
|| Apple Safari || 4.0 ||

Note ^2^: Any Operating Systems that runs the required Oracle database.<br>
Note ^3^: Oracle Express Edition (XE) does not support Materialized View Logs<br>
Note ^4^: To view or develop Oracle Application Express applications, Web browsers must support Java Script and the HTML 4.0 and CSS 1.0 standards.

= Tested Installations =

|| *Operating<br>System* || Rev || *Operating System<br>Edition* || Bits || *Database* || Rev || *Database<br>Edition* || Bits || *APEX<br>Version* ||
|| Windows XP || SP3 || Professional || 32 || Oracle11g || R2 || XE || 32 || 4.0 ||

|| *Web Browser* || *Version* ||
|| Google Chrome || 18.0 ||
